name: Bit Blaster Clone
description:
Its a Clone of old game i used to play as a kid on my big brothers, Handset Game tablet.

 So i tried to create it as a unity practice project. 

Its a simple 2D space shooting game with endless 3 types of enemies. 

Controls 

Buttons to move left & right on the left hand side.

Buttons to control Shooting, Speed Boost , Nuclear Bomb , Speed Slower right hand side.

Power Ups 

  • Shield (B letter)
  • Laser (Letter)
  • Multiple Bullet's (M Letter)
  • Health (S letter) 
  • Bomb 💣

Hope you guys enjoy it and give feedback its only a prototype spend few days to make it
